title: Content Builder
description: Main Content Builder um Inhalte zu erstellen.

title: Content Modules

fields.label: Content Modules
fields.name: contentModules
fields.instructions: Die reinen Inhalts Module, ohne Layout Wrapper wie Accordions

description: Nur für Interne Zwecke (Sammelpunkt für alle Content Builder Module ohne Wrapper wie Accordions)

fields.label: Comment Switch
fields.name: commentSwitch
fields.instructions: Disable disqus comments

fields.label: Fullbleed
fields.name: fi_fullbleed
fields.instructions: Should the image be spread over the entire browser width?

fields.label: Ratio
fields.name: fi_ratio
fields.instructions: Image Ratio

fields.label: Copyright
fields.name: pg_copyright
fields.instructions: Individual Copyright Message

fields.label: Disqus Name
fields.name: pg_disqus_name
fields.instructions: Name of your disqus account

sub_fields.label: Header
sub_fields.name: header
sub_fields.instructions: Accordion Block - please specify a title

fields.label: Anchor Name
fields.name: anchorname
fields.instructions: Anchor name - no special characters and can not start with a number

fields.label: Position
fields.name: position
fields.instructions: If the anchor is too high or too low, the position value can be adjusted (higher or lower).

fields.label: Backbutton
fields.name: backbutton
fields.instructions: Is the button a simple back button?

fields.label: Full Width
fields.name: fullwidth
fields.instructions: If the button centered has been created, you can also give it the full width

fields.label: Position
fields.name: position
fields.instructions: The buttons are arranged left-aligned, can be overwritten.

fields.label: Ratio
fields.name: ratio
fields.instructions: Image Ratio

fields.label: Slides
fields.name: slides
fields.instructions: Card Slides

sub_fields.label: Bildunterschrift
sub_fields.name: caption
sub_fields.instructions: Optionale Bildunterschrift, wird erst in der Lightbox sichtbar.

fields.label: Layouttype
fields.name: layout_type
fields.instructions: Smart for a thumbnail layout in Tumbler Styles (Photogrid), Simple for simple thumbnail matching

fields.label: Width
fields.name: width
fields.instructions: Thumbnail width for the Simple Layout. Regularly, the width of thumbnails depends on the number of images per row. If this is too big or too small, you can set the width yourself.

fields.label: Ratio
fields.name: format
fields.instructions: Image ratio of the thumbnails for the Simple layout mode.

fields.label: Semantische Größe
fields.name: size
fields.instructions: Semantic HTML Size

fields.label: Override Size
fields.name: overwrite
fields.instructions: Visual Fontsize

fields.label: Iframe Content
fields.message: To include content that is included via Iframe (e.g., Youtube or Vimeo videos, Google Maps, or other iFrame content). Under Embed comes the iFrame Code (copy & paste).

fields.label: Embed
fields.name: embed
fields.instructions: Iframe Code

fields.label: Responsive
fields.name: responsive
fields.instructions: Do you want to display the content responsive?

fields.label: Ratio
fields.name: ratio
fields.instructions: Ratio of the iFrame

fields.label: Align
fields.name: align
fields.instructions: Alignment for content smaller than the page

fields.label: Images
fields.name: photos
fields.instructions: Images for the Slider

fields.label: Ratio
fields.name: ratio
fields.instructions: Image Ratio for all Slides

sub_fields.label: Anchor Name
sub_fields.name: anchorname
sub_fields.instructions: Name of the anchor without # (and no other no special character)

fields.label: Layout
fields.name: layout
fields.instructions: The default layout is a simple left-aligned string of the links, with the full width, the buttons are arranged in the full width (break at too small size but around which the buttons are interrelated). The buttons are arranged like a list.

fields.label: Style
fields.name: style
fields.instructions: Style of Bullets on unsorted lists

fields.label: Ratio
fields.name: ratio
fields.instructions: Bildformat

fields.label: Hight Restriction
fields.name: heightrestriction
fields.instructions: If it is a picture in the portrait format, it can be that it is longer than the viewport is high. The height limit limits the height to maximum viewport height - you no longer have to scroll around the entire image.

fields.label: Full Height
fields.name: fullheight
fields.instructions: Should the section be stretched to its full height?

fields.label: Inner Container
fields.name: innerContainer
fields.instructions: Breite of the inner container

fields.label: Anchor
fields.name: anchor
fields.instructions: Optional anchor for jump navigation without # (and without special characters)

fields.label: Four Columns
fields.name: fourColumns
fields.instructions: Layoutvarianten für vier Spalten

fields.label: Adapt Container
fields.name: adaptContainer
fields.instructions: Do you want the background container to be as broad as the content container?

fields.label: Width
fields.name: width
fields.instructions: Width of the background image - default always full width

fields.label: Align
fields.name: align
fields.instructions: Orientation of the background - not applicable for full area

fields.label: Behavior
fields.name: behavior
fields.instructions: Additional layout rules

fields.label: Position
fields.name: position
fields.instructions: Background Position of the image (css syntax)

fields.label: Ratio
fields.name: ratio
fields.instructions: Ratio of the background image

fields.label: Trigger
fields.name: trigger
fields.instructions: Activation link to open the box

fields.label: Spacer
fields.name: spacer
fields.instructions: Element to expand the distance. A spacer is 20px

fields.label: Slide Position
fields.name: slidePosition
fields.instructions: Position der Slides

fields.label: Slides per View
fields.name: slidesPerView
fields.instructions: Anzahl der gleichzeitig sichtbaren Slides. Auf `auto` haben die Slides eine Individuelle Breite.

fields.label: Space Between
fields.name: spaceBetween
fields.instructions: Abstand zwischen den Slides

fields.label: Group Cell
fields.name: groupCell
fields.instructions: Damit können Slides gruppiert werden.

fields.label: Responsive
fields.name: responsive
fields.instructions: Falls mehrere Slides gleichzeitig dargestellt werden, kann man mittels Responsive die Spaltenanzahl reduzieren bei kleinerem Viewport.

fields.label: Autoheight
fields.name: autoheight
fields.instructions: Mit Autoheight ist die Höhe der einzelnen Slides Dynamisch

fields.label: Autoplay
fields.name: autoplay
fields.instructions: Geschwindigkeit des Autoplay Modus

fields.label: Animation Speed
fields.name: speed
fields.instructions: Einstellung der Animationsgeschwindigkeit

fields.label: Loop
fields.name: loop
fields.instructions: Soll der Slider endlos laufen?

fields.label: Freescroll
fields.name: freescroll
fields.instructions: Mit Freescroll kann der Slider frei beweg werden

fields.label: Hide Navigation
fields.name: navigation
fields.instructions: Soll die Navigation versteckt werden?

fields.label: Hide Pagination
fields.name: pagination
fields.instructions: Soll die Pagination versteckt werden?
